description: Erection of outbuilding with green roof in rear garden.
decision_conditions:
Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the end of three years from the date of this permission.

Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of Section 91 of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).

Condition : 2 - The development hereby permitted shall be carried out in accordance with the following approved plans: 01-A, 02-A, 03, 04, 05, 06, SkyGarden Maintenance Guidlines, SkyGarden Data Sheet.

Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning.
Condition : 3 - The living roof in the area indicated on the approved roof plan shall be fully provided and maintained in accordance with the details hereby approved prior to first use of the outbuilding.

Reason: In order to ensure the development undertakes reasonable measures to take account of biodiversity and the water environment in accordance with policies CC1, CC2, CC3,  D1 and A3 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
Condition : 4 - The outbuilding hereby approved shall only be used for purposes incidental to the use of the main property (Flat A 12 Garlinge Road) and shall not be used as a separate residential dwelling or a business premises.  
 
Reason: In order to protect the residential amenities of neighbouring occupiers and prevent substandard living accommodation in accordance with policies A1 and D1 of the London Borough of Camden Local Plan 2017.
